title: Art Institute Images
copy: Press Image Terms The Art Institute of Chicago provides high-resolution images to members of the press for publicity purposes only. Images may only be used before and during the run of the exhibition at the Art Institute and must be reproduced in full-color. Unless granted explicit approval by the Department of Public Affairs, alteration or modification of images—including cropping, bleeding, inversion, rotation, superimposition, or overprinting—is prohibited. Images must be accompanied by the captions provided. Members of the press who plan to visit the museum may contact the Department of Public Affairs for a press pass. Please provide press affiliation, project details, and mailing address to the Department of Public Affairs at (312) 443-3363 or publicaffairs@artic.edu .
